content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position (-0.5, -9.5)
Consists of steam engine (position -0.5, -9.5), boiler (position -4.5, 23.0), and offshore pump (position not specified).

### Copper plate mine at position (0.0, 0.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (0.0, 0.0)
- Burner mining drill (position not specified) and a furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)

### Lab at position (not specified)
Consists of a lab entity (position not specified).

### Pipe groups
Consists of the following pipe groups:
- PipeGroup (position -9.5, -6.5)
- PipeGroup (position -15.5, 23.5)
- PipeGroup (position -18.5, 25.5)
- PipeGroup (position -21.5, 28.5)
- PipeGroup (position -20.5, 29.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to pick up a pipe group
- Ensure you are within the correct position to pick up the pipe group. Verify the coordinates before executing the pickup command.

### Errors when moving to a position
- Confirm that the position being passed to the move_to function is correctly formatted as an object with x and y attributes, rather than a tuple. 

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it.
